Pos.description: Player's position on the field (e.g., Defender, Midfielder)

Squad.description: Club team the player is playing for

Comp.description: Competition the player is participating in (e.g., League, Cup)

Born.description: Year of birth (integer) or a String representation

SoT.description: Total number of shots on target

SoT%.description: Percentage of shots on target (SoT / Sh * 100)

Sh/90.description: Average number of shots per 90 minutes

SoT/90.description: Average number of shots on target per 90 minutes

G/SoT.description: Goals per shot on target ratio (Gls / SoT)

Dist.description: Average distance of shots taken (unit dependent)

PK.description: Number of successful penalty kicks taken

PKatt.description: Total number of penalty kicks attempted
